title: Machine Learning-Based Instructional Design Workshop for High-Strength, High-Toughness Aluminum Alloy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational materials science theories, basic machine learning concepts, and data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design exploration for pre-service/in-service teachers, focusing on lecture design and science education innovation methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of machine learning-based design systems (MLDS) and apply them to material property prediction
Learners can understand the strength-ductility trade-off and propose optimization strategies in aluminum alloy design
Learners can analyze virtual experimental results using MLDS and develop instructional design plans linking them to actual material development
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
